name: RLS & Tenancy
description: Row-level security and multi-tenancy with per-organization data isolation and secure links in SMS.

prd.problemStatement: Multi-tenant systems require strict data isolation to prevent cross-organization data leaks. RLS ensures users only access their organization's data.
userStories: As an organization, I want data isolation so that my information is private
As a user, I want secure links so that SMS messages don't expose sensitive data
